direction.raw_text: lunar eclipse in ten years! ON GHOSTBUSTERS AND SLIMER All looking out window as eclipse continues
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ray, what's this have to do with Egon being a chicken?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Werechickens only appear during a full moon, and for the next few minutes, the moon's not full. INT. LAB -- ON DOOR Door opens and Ray pecks in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Egon? ANGLE ON EGON Seen from the waist up (he's not wearing clothes), looking around, confused.  He sees Ray.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ray, what is going on? WIDER ANGLE Egon is holding his tattered coveralls in front of his waist, like a skirt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And why am I naked? Suddenly Slimer flies INTO SHOT and gives Egon a big, sloppy kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Egon! (KISSING SOUNDS) ON PETER AND WINSTON PETER Sit down, Egon, we have some good news and some bad news.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bad news first.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've been turned into a werechicken! ON EGON His glasses slip to the end of his nose as his eyes widen.  He pushes them back up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A werechicken? ON RAY He hurriedly thumbs through the TOBIN SPIRIT GUIDE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Were-aardvarks ... were-bears werechickens! (reads) "The werechicken appears during the full moon.  Anyone it bites will turn into another werechicken." (he looks at Egon) That egg Peter brought in, it hatched and... ON EGON He rubs his rear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I remember the bite clearly.  How long will I stay like this? ON RAY, WINSTON and PETER Looking at the Tobin Guide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: According to this, there is an antidote. But we've gotta move fast -- the eclipse only lasts three minutes! INT. FIREHOUSE KITCHEN Slimer scrambles through the cupboard, grabbing various bottles of stuff, and hands them to Winston who adds ingredients to mixing bowl and stirs while Ray reads from Tobin's Guide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "One tablespoon paprika, one clove of garlic, some parsley for color, cup of gelatin..." ANGLE ON WINDOW Through it we see the eclipsed moon starting to emerge from shadow. INT. LAB -- ANGLE ON EGON His pupils look constricted and he's perspiring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't feel well. Peter steps INTO SHOT, puts arm around Egon's shoulders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take it easy, Egon.  You're gonna be fine. (SHOUTS O.S.; worried) Hurry it up, guys! INT.  KITCHEN -- ON WINSTON AND RAY RAY (reading hurriedly) "And one tablespoon of chickenbane." ON SLIMER He rummages through shelves, then looks down at Ray.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No chickenbane! ANOTHER ANGLE Ray and winston exchange panicky looks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then we've gotta go with this!  C'mon! They run OUT with the mixing bowl of liquid.  Slimer follows. INT. LAB -- CLOSE ON EGON'S LEGS They're once again turning into chicken legs and chicken feet.  Toes popping out like popcorn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Ray!! WIDER ANGLE As Peter and Egon stare down at the chicken legs and chicken feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's changing again! Ray, Slimer and Winston rush INTO SHOT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quick, Egon, drink this! Winston hands the bowl of potion to Egon, who gulps it down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're too late! CLOSER -- EGON As the transformation  and feathers  rise up  his shoulders.  Suddenly, the transformation  stops at  the neck.   DRAMATIC MUSIC STOPS, too. ON PETER, RAY, WINSTON AND SLIMER They stare, wide-eyed.  After A BEAT -- PETER What happened? WIDER ANGLE To include Egon, who is once again a six-foot-tall chicken, but with Egon's own neck and head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The potion only partly worked, because of the missing chickenbane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, we hafta do something!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't get your feathers ruffled, Peter. There's a logical solution to every problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What was that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The werechicken that bit Egon.  It's still out there somewhere. ANOTHER ANGLE PETER (to others) Let's stop that thing before it makes drumsticks out of anyone else! (to Egon) Un, no offense, Egon. The three normal Ghostbusters dash toward door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. -- AERIAL VIEW -- MANHATTAN -- NIGHT ECTO-2 glides over the city, running lights blinking. INT. -- ECTO-2 -- MOVING Peter at the controls.  Slimer sits beside him, looking down at the city through binoculars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All quiet on the chicken front.  How about down there? INT. -- ECTO-1 -- MOVING Winston driving.  Ray on the radio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not a peep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No pun intended. EXT. SUPERMARKET - NIGHT Several people run out front door SCREAMING as ECTO-1 passes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it! Winston cranks the wheel. EXT.  ECTO-1 As it makes a SCREECHING U-turn. EXT. -- SUPERMARKET Ecto-1 SKIDS up, doors open, and Ray and Winston leap out, blasters at the ready, running toward store entrance. INT. -- SUPERMARKET Ray and winston run in and stop inside door beside a panicked BOX BOY who points o.s.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's in there!  A big chicken!  It's gotta be ten feet tall! CLOSER ANGLE Ray and Winston exchange glances.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ten feet tall?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe fifteen, I dunno.  Big! (he runs o.s.) I'm outta here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's split up. They run off in opposite directions, flanking the long aisles. ON RAY PAN WITH him as he cautiously moves along, aisle by aisle.  At far end of aisles, Winston can be seen doing the same.  The market is thrashed, spilled groceries everywhere. ANOTHER ANGLE As they reach the last aisle.  No chicken.  Ray joins Winston.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How could we lose a fifteen foot-tall chicken?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We didn't!  Come on! They hurry o.s. INT. MEAT DEPT. -- ON BUTCHER He's hiding under his butcher block, trembling.  Ray and Winston run INTO SHOT.  The Butcher looks up, eyes wide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A giant chicken just came through here -- it was thirty feet tall! CLOSER ANGLE WINSTON Thirty feet tall? ANOTHER ANGLE The Butcher is pointing out open door.  Beyond is a parking lot with a trail of crushed cars right down the middle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah!  Look what it did to those cars! Ray and Winston race out the door. EXT. INDUSTRIAL DISTRICT - WIDE ON ECTO-2 FLYING -- NIGHT The little chopper, lights blinking, skims low past three-and four-story buildings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's how big?  Okay, Ray, I admit you were right about these Werechickens,... INT.  ECTO-2 -- MOVING Peter and Slimer, as before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...but I definitely don't buy them growing to the size of buildings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (covers mouth, LAUGHTER FIZZING through his closed, flapping lips. "How absurd.") Suddenly, the head of the Werechicken rears up INTO SHOT right in front of Ray and Slimer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ray, you were right!  The chicken's here, and he's a walking high-rise! INT. -- ECTO-1 -- NIGHT -- MOVING RAY (into radio) On our way, Peter. Winston floors it and he and Ray accelerate forward INTO CAMERA. INT. BUNKROOM -- GHOSTBUSTERS HQ - MORNING Egon is "perched" on the window sill, looking pensively out at the city, still a chicken from the neck down.  A BEAT, then:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Egon!  What happened?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a long story, Janine.   Can you get my coat, please?  I'm due at the weather board in forty-five... (CLUCK) ...minutes. ON JANINE She stares at Egon, totally bewildered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But what ...? (thinks better of asking) Nevermind. ANOTHER ANGLE Janine takes a long yellow raincoat off a door hook and helps him into it. He's completely covered except for his head and feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you sure you wanna go to a meeting like
direction.name: direction

result.heading: KITCHEN -- ON WINSTON AND RAY RAY

dialogue.raw_text: (swallowing, GULPING sounds) As Egon drinks, his arms transform into wings and he drops the bowl, breaking it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (HOWL) CLOSER ANGLE Strands of slime stand straight up on the nape of Slimer's "neck" at the sound -- like a frightened cat -- and he dives into a test tube in a rack on Egon's workbench.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (SQUEALS as he goes) ON RAY AND WINSTON looking around.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (SCREAMING as they exit) INT. -- ECTO-1 - MOVING Winston and Ray look back at exiting people.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: WERECHICKEN (deafening HOWL) ECTO-2 is buffeted about by the howl as Peter jams the stick forward. WIDER ON ECTO-2 It makes a steep, banking dive and gets the hell out of there, barely escaping the big Werechicken's beak that SNAPS shut on thin air just behind Ecto-2's retreating tail. INT. -- ECTO-2 -- MOVING Peter is shaken, but in control.  Slimer is trembling like green Jell-O.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (startled CLUCK) Startled, Egon flutters up off the sill, gravity takes over, and he lands on his feathered butt. WIDER ANGLE Revealing Janine standing frozen in the doorway, eyes wide with disbelief, hands to her cheeks.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trust me.  I'm of sound mind at least. ANGLE ON EGON As he struts toward the door, we see his tail protruding through a slit in the back of coat.  He EXITS, CLUCKING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's heading down 34th toward the Empire State Building. EXT. -- THE STREETS -- DAWN Ecto-1 SPEEDS around a corner, SIREN blaring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Check!  We're almost there. EXT. EMPIRE STATE BLDG. -- DAWN Sun rises behind the werechicken as it approaches in distance.  With each HOWL, the streets SHAKE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take over, Slimer!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roger! Slimer grabs the control stick in both hands as Peter leans out to one side with his blaster and fires downward. ANGLE ON WERECHICKEN Caught in the three crossing streams.  It FLAILS about, knocking over street lights and bashing in the sides of buildings, and lets out a deafening HOWL.  A MONSTROUS SPIRIT emerges from its body and fills the screen like a transparent film.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's reel him in! WIDER ANGLE As Ray, Winston and Peter's beams draw the Spirit toward the trap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trap's full!  Somebody forgot to empty it! ON ECTO-2 The wind is really bouncing it around.  Slimer has his hands full, while Peter continues shooting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whose job was it? RAY AND WINSTON turn to each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! CLOSE ON TRAP Light FLASHES rapidly.  Trap begins to shake and glow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's gonna blow! LOW ANGLE -- ECTO-2 WINSTON (VO) (over walkie-talkie) Peter, get outa here! It banks, gets the hell away. RAY AND WINSTON turn off their proton guns and are KNOCKED down by the released force as the freed Monstrous Spirit whooshes skyward.  The STORM abruptly disappears, as if SUCKED up.  The trap stops shaking and SNAPS shut. ANGLE ON WERECHICKEN As the Spirit POPS back into its body, JARRING it.  Its chicken face contorts with new ANGER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So how're we gonna, put that big bird on ice, guys'
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Peter, that's not a bed idea!  Chicken freezes at very low temperatures! CLOSER ANGLE WINSTON Yeah, but how do you freeze a 50-foot chicken in August? A BEAT, then the three guys look at each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Egon's weather balloon! EXT. -- BUILDING ROOFTOP -- MORNING Not far from the Empire State Building.  Egon stands before a group of seated MEN and WOMEN --THE WEATHER BOARD -- in his rain coat.  To one side, the weather balloon hovers above them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Distinguished members of the Weather Board, my weather balloon has the clu-cluck-clu- capability -- ANGLE ON EGON The top of the Empire State Building is visible behind him as he holds the small weather device control box in one winged hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... of entering the upper atmosphere where clu-cluck-clu cloud formations occur. ANGLE ON BOARD MEMBERS They look at each other, puzzled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There, it can electronically alter weather cut-cut-cut-con-ditions to produce sun, rain, or... (BAWK!) ...snow. Ecto-2 ascends into view behind him and hovers, the chopper's rotors blowing Egon's raincoat up over his head, exposing the chicken body underneath. ANGLE ON AUDIENCE Their mouths drop open as they stare at Egon's chicken body.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (CLUCKING as he goes) CLOSE JANINE Staring after him in disbelief. EXT. MID-TOWN MANHATTAN -- ANGLE ON WERECHICKEN It walks along stepping on cars, kicking over telephone poles, etc., a la Godzilla.  The streets SHAKE.  Panicky pedestrians flee the Werechicken's giant feet.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (panicky WALLA) INT. -- ECTO-2 -- MOVING Peter and Slimer are following giant chicken.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (HOWLS) LOW ANGLE ON ECTO-1 Approaching CAMERA fast, it SCREECHES to a halt.  Doors fly open.  Ray and Winston LEAP out, open fire, their proton streams angling upward. LOW ANGLE POV - WERECHICKEN Moving toward them down the concrete canyon, flattening street lamps and power poles.  Ecto-2 can be seen flying above and behind it.  The proton streams are up toward it. INT. ECTO-2 PETER
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (enraged HOWLS) ON RAY AND WINSTON Ray tosses out the trap.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (angry HOWLS) CLOSER ON TRAP Ray's boot stomps on trigger and trap springs open.  As the Spirit comes into contact with the trap a small STORM ERUPTS around it.  SPARKS and LIGHTNING BOLTS fly.  A HURRICANE-like WIND BLOWS. ON RAY AND WINSTON Being buffeted by wind, struggling to hang onto their throwers as they continue firing.  They have to SHOUT over the NOISE.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: WIDER ANGLE It turns and starts up the side of the Empire State Building. EXT. EMPIRE STATE BUILDING - MORNING The werechicken is halfway to the top.  PULL BACK to reveal Peter, Slimer, Winston and Ray standing in street looking up at him.  Ecto-1 and 2 are behind them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (puzzled MUTTERING WALLA) RESUME ON EGON EGON (VO)(CONT)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (excited WALLA) ANGLE ON EGON He pulls raincoat down off his face, holding it in place with one hand as he looks at audience with forced smile.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: er, can explain this, but -- Slimer flies INTO SHOT beside Egon and WHISPERS in his ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? He looks around to where Slimer is pointing. EGON'S POV As the Werechicken climbs into view, scaling the upper stories of the Empire State Building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Egon, can we freeze that big chicken with your weather balloons
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, but you'll have to work the controls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Piece of cake. EXT. -- ECTO-2 -- MORNING It banks off toward the Empire State Building as the Werechicken reaches the top of the spire. ON WERECHICKEN As it gets "comfortable" on the spire, fluffing its feathers.  It begins to quiver (like Maude did earlier when she laid an egg).
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's it doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It looks like it's about to lay an -- Winston puts a hand over Ray's mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want to hear it. ANGLE ON WEATHER BALLOON It rises from weather bureau rooftop, then drifts along horizontally, away from the Empire State Building.  It stops, then begins to rise again.  The sky darkens as the balloon rises into the clouds. INT. ECTO-2 - MOVING Peter, Egon, Slimer, as before.  Peter operates the weather balloon control box while Slimer flies the chopper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, Peter, the balloon's in position. Turn the lever to the extreme left. CLOSE UP ON WEATHER CONTROL BOX Peter turns a lever. ANGLE ON BALLOON The balloon and surrounding clouds start to freeze, turning white and forming ice on them.  Suddenly, snow starts to fall. ON SLIMER He sticks his tongue out and catches some snowflakes. ANGLE ON WERECHICKEN Blizzard-like snow pelts it.  The chicken begins to stiffen and turn white with frost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They did it!  All-right!! They high-five each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. FIREHOUSE -- NIGHT A heavy snow continues to fall as CAMERA MOVES IN MAUDE (VO) (calls) Anyone for dessert? INT, FIREHOUSE - DINING AREA Maude (back to normal) emerges from kitchen carrying a large, steaming bowl.  Seated around the table are Egon (back to normal) Peter, Winston, Ray and Zeke.  No Slimer.  There are half-empty soup bowls in front of everyone and the diners all look full to the point of weariness -- except Slimer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You bet, Maude. ON PETER As he looks at bowl of soup Maude sets down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lemme guess -- more chickenbane soup! ON EGON spooning soup eagerly into his bowl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm actually starting to like it. ON MAUDE MAUDE No more werechicken problems for us, eh, Egon? (CHUCKLES)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It came from the lab! The Ghostbusters burst from their chairs and run o.s. INT. HALLWAY OUTSIDE LAB As the Ghostbusters cautiously advance, blasters ready. INT. LAB -- ON DOOR It opens and the Ghostbusters peer in.  Suddenly ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's just Slimer groovin' to his new James Brown tape. ON SLIMER As he continues to groove to the music.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I feel good! I knew that I would So good, so good, so good! (big James Brown HOWL as we --) (HOWLS) ON GHOSTBUSTERS Peter turns to the others in disgust.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me, how do I get out of this chicken outfit?
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (distant SQUAWKS) NEW ANGLE The Weather Board members see the Werechicken and start to SCREAM.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ON EGON He JUMPS onto a rope ladder hanging from Ecto-2 and climbs inside.  Slimer flies in right behind him and Ecto-2 rises up OUT OF SHOT. INT. -- ECTO-2 -- MOVING Egon settles into passenger seat.  Slimer hovers behind them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (hideous CROW) ON RAY AND WINSTON On street below, looking skyward through binoculars.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (angry SQUAWKS) ANGLE ON STREETS Snow falls on Ray and Winston as they gaze skyward.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (HOWL) WIDER ANGLE Everyone freezes and looks o.s.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (another HOWL) SWISH PAN to ... A HUGE SHADOW on the lab wall, its head making a "pecking" motion like a werechicken.  After a beat, PAN DOWN to reveal Slimer with a Walkman on his head, "pecking" his head to the rhythm of his music.  Slimer HOWLS again ...
dialogue.name: dialogue
